feed.title: GitHub Haskell Daily Trending
feed.subtitle: Daily Trending of Haskell in GitHub

entry.title: HanStolpo/JiraStructureToDocx
entry.summary:
Experimental utilities to generate a Docx document from Jira Structure

Experimental utilities for generating a MS Word Docx document from a issues in a Jira Structure plug-in structure using Haskell modules http-conduit, pandoc, aeson, parsec and some more. It supports basic Jira markup in descriptions and summaries.
